page.title: 08ARMED FORCES
page.content:
{ARMED FORCES.
The nearest armed force bases are R.A.F Lossiemouth and Kinloss.They are about 3&5 minutes away as the fighter plane flies.As the area around Glass is not at all densely populated,low flying planes often come past at great speed. {ATTITUDE OF LOCALS TO THE PLANES.} Q.Do the low flying planes from Lossie. or Kinloss annoy you? A.Not really,they have to practise somewhere. A.Yes! A.Yes,definately. A.I don't mind but they scare the animals. Q. What do you feel about the low flying planes from Lossiemouth and Kinloss? A.I don't mind,I'm glad they practise.
